ing: 1 dash hot pepper sauce, or to taste
des: "Simple ingredients like molasses, ketchup and ginger come together to create a delicious marinade for steak. It's also great on pork and chicken."
ins: In a medium bowl, mix molasses, ketchup, ground ginger, thyme, black pepper, distilled white vinegar, hot pepper sauce and garlic powder. Place desired meat in mixture. Marinate in the refrigerator 3 hours or longer before grilling.
